questions.question: The study of LAI is called ________

explanations.a: Photometry is the study and measurement of light.
explanations.b: A branch of physics that deals with light or the study of light and its effects.
explanations.c: Correct Answer. The study of LAI is called phyllometry.
explanations.d: The study of LAI is called phyllometry.

questions.question: Indirect Methods of LAI Estimation are Non Destructive in nature. Say True or False

explanations.a: Correct Answer. Indirect Methods of LAI Estimation are Non Destructive in nature.
explanations.b: Indirect Methods of LAI Estimation are Non Destructive in nature.

questions.question: The disadvantage of the direct method of estimating LAI is that it is

explanations.a: The disadvantage of the direct method of estimating LAI is that it is Destructive, Time consuming and Expensive.
explanations.b: The disadvantage of the direct method of estimating LAI is that it is Destructive, Time consuming and Expensive.
explanations.c: The disadvantage of the direct method of estimating LAI is that it is Destructive, Time consuming and Expensive.
explanations.d: Correct Answer. The disadvantage of the direct method of estimating LAI is that it is Destructive, Time consuming and Expensive.

questions.question: The disadvantage of the indirect method is that in some cases it can ________ the value of LAI in very dense canopies

explanations.a: Correct Answer. The disadvantage of the indirect method is that in some cases it can underestimate the value of LAI in very dense canopies.
explanations.b: The disadvantage of the indirect method is that in some cases it can underestimate the value of LAI in very dense canopies.

questions.question: The Leaf Area Index is an important indicator of

explanations.a: The Leaf Area Index is an important indicator of Radiation, Precipitation interception, Energy conversion and water balance.
explanations.b: The Leaf Area Index is an important indicator of Radiation, Precipitation interception, Energy conversion and water balance.
explanations.c: The Leaf Area Index is an important indicator of Radiation, Precipitation interception, Energy conversion and water balance.
explanations.d: Correct Answer. The Leaf Area Index is an important indicator of Radiation, Precipitation interception, Energy conversion and water balance.

questions.question: Optimum LAI for Apple ranges from

explanations.a: Optimum LAI for Apple ranges from 1.5 and 5
explanations.b: Optimum LAI for Apple ranges from 1.5 and 5
explanations.c: Correct Answer. Optimum LAI for Apple ranges from 1.5 and 5
explanations.d: Optimum LAI for Apple ranges from 1.5 and 5

questions.question: ________ uses the relationship between biomass and the leaf area to calculate the LAI.

explanations.a: Leaf perimeter is measured by a planimeter in Planimetric method, the area of leaves is derived, and their ratio to the ground is calculated.
explanations.b: Correct Answer. Gravimetric method uses the relationship between biomass and the leaf area to calculate the LAI. Biomass is estimated by finding the dry weight of leaves.
explanations.c: In Inclined point quadrat Method vegetation canopy is measured by counting the number of contacts made by a needle in a given quadrat.
explanations.d: In Leaf measurement method each leaf area is manually measured.

questions.question: LAI of ________ is good for tomatoes

explanations.a: LAI of good for tomatoes is 3 to 4
explanations.b: LAI of good for tomatoes is 3 to 4
explanations.c: Correct Answer. LAI of good for tomatoes is 3 to 4
explanations.d: LAI of good for tomatoes is 3 to 4
